chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog, a stickler for routine, croaked, "Chirpy! 💊 Time!" Chirpy the chick, engrossed in 🪅 building a LEGO castle, chirped back, "Later, Ferd!" 🐸 glared. 10:30 PM rolled around. Chirpy, mid-castle, suddenly sneezed a tiny feather. "Achoo! 🤧 Maybe Ferdinand was right..." He trudged to the medicine cabinet, castle unfinished. 🏰 Moral: Always listen to amphibian doctors. (They have excellent bedside manor...usually.)
